bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions lasting for long without being cured. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 35: 諸久瘡者，內熱外虛，為風濕所乘，則頭面身體生瘡。其臟 內熱實氣盛，熱結肌肉，其熱留滯不歇，故瘡經久不瘥 , “For all types of chronic sores the following applies. There is inner heat associated with external depletion. Wind and moisture avail themselves [of this depletion] and as a result head, the face and entire body develop sores. Heat abounds in the depots as repletion qi. The heat combines with the muscles and the flesh. The heat abides and does not abate. Hence the sores do not heal for a long time”.
